casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Stanley Ray JAMES. No. 315P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 9, 2007. Daniel O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of July 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of July 2007."
